title: 1.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create a program that outputs a timeline of significant school events that have impacted your life. The timeline should be displayed vertically, with earlier events appearing near the top and later events near the bottom.

Output format:
Your program should produce an output that adheres to the following formatting rules:
● The title 'School events timeline' should be displayed at the top.
● The class should be displayed on the left side of the output.
● A vertical line (|) should be displayed next to the class. It should run all the way down the output.
● The class should be left-aligned, with at least one space between the class and the vertical line.
● Four lines of space should separate each class.
● To the right of the vertical line, display the month and year in which each event took place, for example, 4/01, separated by a space.
● To the right of the date, briefly describe the event.
Timeline content:
Make a list of at least five significant school-related events that have impacted you. Some examples include
● Academic achievements
● School tours, excursions, or visits
● Sports achievements
● Achievements or participation in extracurricular activities like music, dance, theater, sports, and so on.
● Participation in school clubs, house events, competitions, and other activities.

Incremental grades:
● The timeline should begin with your grade when the first event occurred. The grade should increment in one-year periods, appearing after every four lines in the output.

Research how to use tabs ( ) in your print statements to enhance the layout of your timeline.

Here is a sample output:
